## Utils.getPkgFromModuleId() method

Gets the `package` from the `module` id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPkgFromModuleId(mi: string): PkgNode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mi | string | The fully resolved id of the <code>module</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>
